tag_list: veodin, keyrocket, keyboard-shortcuts, productivity, excel, word, power-point, outlook, windows-explorer
overview: Jan Mechtel is the founder and product owner of KeyRocket. During his studies of International Business at ESCP Europe Business School, he completed internships in multinational companies such as Merrill Lynch and McKinsey & Company. Later, he was employed for several years at the software company Ableton AG as a team manager in financial controlling. Before founding Veodin and launching KeyRocket, Jan worked as a freelance programmer, leading several successful software projects.
